role.description: If provided, new value for user's role in the project.  Requires caller to have roles sufficient to acces the user in the project (subcontractor with same companyID, or project-admin or project-manager), and the new role must be less than or equal to the role of the caller.

companyID.description: If provided, new value for user's company in the project. Requires that the caller be a project-admin or project-manager.

clientRoles.description: If provided, list of new client level roles for the user.  Requires caller to have roles sufficient to grant the given roles to the user.

employeeID.description: If provided, new value for the employeeID field for the user. Requires that the caller be a project-admin or project-manager.

notes.description: If provided, new value for the notes field for the user. Requires that the caller be a project-admin or project-manager.
